text: When people hear good music, it makes them homesick for something they never had, and never will have.
author: E. W. Howe

text: A movie goes from several stages, from idea to script. As you continue shooting, you will make some adjustments. You're constantly adjusting. It's like a piece of music. You're constantly trying to make it better.
author: Robert Rodriguez

text: Good music is good music, and everything else can go to hell.
author: Dave Matthews

text: Country music is important to me, and I love it, but it's not my whole life.
author: George Strait

text: What I took back, because of my exposure to the Jewish music of the 30s and the 40s in my upbringing with my father, was that kind of theatrical songwriting. It was always a part of my character. This desire to make people laugh.
author: Pete Townshend
